title: What are some good alternatives to HP for an affordable all-in-one wireless printer? - Quora

response.answer_text: I prefer Brother printers for affordability, both on the purchase and the supplies. Inkjet printers are a money pit. Go with a Brother laser printer or MFC ( Multi Function Center) which sounds like what you want.) See more at: Scott King Walker's answer to Which printer is better, Brother or HP?

I have had a Brother all in one inkjet. I just replaced my dead HP AIO Business Inkjet Pro with a Canon Maxify MB2720 inkjet. It was just $143.00 (Canadian dollars) instead of an iffy $300.00 (Canadian dollar) repair that was not guaranty to fix my HP printer.
